name: Hand In Hand
storyline:
Two souls live in a fairy-tale world. But once everything changes, they quarrel and lose each other. Now each of them must independently embark on a journey full of difficulties and dangers. And only after finding a fragile connection between themselves and walking hand in hand they can meet. This is a story about the importance of relationships and mutual assistance. But every story has a deeper meaning...

Start this unforgettable adventure and find the answer.
summary: An atmospheric platformer with co-op play in single-player mode. Immerse yourself in the ethnic world of two heroes, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles together, explore the fairy forest and other locations, help each other in battles against bosses.
